definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shut up, restrain, withhold (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּלָא]], klo0; Eth. kal0: restrain, hinder; As. Kâlû, id.; Ar. kala0’a protect Qor 21:43 cf Ba:ZMG 1887, 605 Anm. 4)—
shut up, c. acc. 1Sa 6:10 (+ [[בְ]] loc.), Je 32:3; pt. pass. Je 32:2 ([[בְ]] loc.), fig. Ps 88:9 (opp. [[יחא]]).

definitions.title: Pi. 2. 3.
definitions.body: withhold, [[אֶת־קִבְרוֹ]] ´[[כ]] [[מִמְּ ְמִקְּבׂר מֵתְֶָ]] Ge 23:6 (P), [[רַחֲמֶי ְמִמֶָּנּי]] ´[[כ]] Ps 40:12, Hag 1:10 b, prob. also v:a (rd. [[טָָל]] for MT LXX [[מִטָָּל]], We); abs. [[אַל־תִּכְלָאִי]] (sc. exiles) Is 43:6 (‖[[תְּנִי]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּכָּלֵא הַגֶּשֶׁם מִן־הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Ge 8:2 (J), and the rain from heaven was restrained, cf. [[וַיִּכָּֽלְאוּ מַיִם]] [[רַבִּים]] Ez Eze 31:15 (in fig.; ‖[[מנע]]); [[וַיִּכָּלֵא הָעָם מֵהָבִיא]] Ex 36:6 (P).
